The Yuhua Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in the Yuhua Town of Yintai District, Tongchuan City, Shaanxi Province

operators: Shaanxi Shanmei Tongchuan Mining Industry Company
owners: Shaanxi Coal and Chemical Industry Group
web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by Shaanxi Shanmei Tongchuan Mining Industry Company, which is a subsidiary of Shaanxi Coal and Chemical Industry Group.
